wordpressWpDailyReads.content:
Hi there! We all know that thinking about our finances can be intimidating to say the least, but we at Sherman Wealth Management are here to help you improve your financial well-being. There’s so much information out there, so I wanted to share what I think are the most important reads of the day:

  1. Fund Managers Are Ditching Wall Street for Florida
  2. Charitable giving in US tops $400 billion for first time
  3. SEC charges Merrill Lynch for overcharging customers for mortgage-backed securities
  4. New Jersey clears way for sports betting. Make sure you share your winnings with the IRS
  5. The Fed is hiking rates Wednesday, but here’s what else you need to know
